name: Red Sauce-a Pizza Tower AU
description:
Join Ravio in his quezt into the pizza tower, albeit thingz have very much changed in the tower, zo your journey mayyyyyyyyyy be hard.

Demos and upcoming thingz

  • World 1 Demo 
  • The Screech Demo 
  • Halfway there Demo 
  • THE FULL GAME
  • The full game will have 8 very long levels, and some bonus inbetween, so it'll be short but hopefully fun.

That'z all. enjoy!   

Characters and some sprites in Pizza Tower by Pizza Tower Guy
